wired-slider.description: Hand-drawn sketchy slider web component which allows user to select a value from a range by moving the slider thumb. Range can be set using the min, max value. Default range is 0-100.

min.description: Minimum value of the slider. Default is 0.

max.description: Maximum value of the slider. Default ia 100.

knobradius.description: Radius of the knob of the slider.
